long_description: The men's REI Airflyte Shorts help you comfortably stretch out your training mileage, thanks to performance fabrics and storage for running essentials. Shorts feature a 2-way-stretch polyester that wicks moisture and dries fast. Fabric also provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Recycled polyester liner brief offers 4-way stretch for comfortable striding; it also wicks moisture and dries fast. Elastic loops on the front of the shorts are sized to hold energy gels. Zippered lumbar pocket features a sweat-resistant skin-side lining to keep cash, a key and a credit card dry; shorts also have roomy side pockets. Comfortable details include seamless leg hem that's shaped to be higher in front for striding comfort; elastic/drawcord waist fine-tunes the fit. The men's REI Airflyte Shorts have reflective trim to increase visibility in low light.
